texts.value: Phosphorylates myosin light chains (By similarity). Acts as a positive regulator of apoptosis
Interacts with CHP1; the interaction induces CHP1 to translocate from the Golgi to the nucleus
Colocalizes with STK17B at the plasma membrane
Highly expressed in placenta, lung, pancreas. Lower levels in heart, brain, liver, skeletal muscle and kidney
Belongs to the protein kinase superfamily. CAMK Ser/Thr protein kinase family. DAP kinase subfamily

features.description: Loss of activity and of apoptotic function.
